rows.label: qst700201_msg0001
rows.name: Meh... No customers, nothing to do...

rows.label: qst700201_msg0002
rows.name: Meh-meh! Welcome to Obibi's Textiles!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0003
rows.name: Oh? Friends not customers?

rows.label: qst700201_msg0004
rows.name:
Obibi not have time for window
shoppers! Please to scram!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0005
rows.name: What you mean, I not look busy?

rows.label: qst700201_msg0006
rows.name: Is none of friends' business!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0007
rows.name:
But...friends make valid observation.
*sigh*

rows.label: qst700201_msg0008
rows.name:
Nobody come to check out wares of
Obibi. Patience is coming end of rope.

rows.label: qst700201_msg0009
rows.name:
Not sure why, but even other
Nopon seem to keep distance.
Maybe time to pack up shop.

rows.label: qst700201_msg0010
rows.name:
If only there were easy way to rake
in buckets of gold in one fell swoop...

rows.label: qst700201_msg0011
rows.name: Meh-MEH! Obibi has it!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0012
rows.name:
Obibi recently spy Nopon littlepon
around town, never see before.

rows.label: qst700201_msg0013
rows.name:
Littlepon traveling alone at young age?
Is only one possibility.

rows.label: qst700201_msg0014
rows.name:
Must be littlepon of Alst's hottest
trade guild, name of Voltis!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0015
rows.name:
Would owe great debt if friends could
ask littlepon for big inspiration!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0016
rows.name:
Obibi wait right here, looking forward
to news of good news!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0101
rows.name:
Friends find littlepon from Voltis
Trade Guild?

rows.label: qst700201_msg0102
rows.name:
Last Obibi see of littlepon, was
wandering around main thoroughfare
between gates of capital!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0103
rows.name:
That littlepon may just be ticket
to keeping business floaty-floaty!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0201
rows.name:
Friends pick up everything Obibi need
for hat-making?

rows.label: qst700201_msg0301
rows.name:
That very impressive feat! Yes, should
be more than enough!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0302
rows.name:
Is time to roll up sleeves and get
wings flapping!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0401
rows.name:
Still need more materials for making
of fine hats!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0402
rows.name:
If want to make hat with cute trim,
first need few materials.

rows.label: qst700201_msg0403
rows.name:
Need 4 Cotton Branches, 2 sprigs of
Angel's Sage, and 1 Sunflower Rogue!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0404
rows.name:
If want to make hat with casual trim,
first need few materials.

rows.label: qst700201_msg0405
rows.name:
Need 4 Corkscrew Creepers, 3 Panda
Pansies, and 1 heap of Floral Soil!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0406
rows.name:
These resources only found in Iira
and Gula, so friends will have to
search both places to get hands on.
